case.name: Australian Olives Limited v Stout (No. 2) [2007] FCA 2090 (24 December 2007)

citphrases.citphrase: consideration of an application by a responsible entity of two registered managed investment schemes (among six schemes) for the propagation of olive trees and the production of olives, registered under the provisions of the corporations act 2001 (cth) for an interim injunction to restrain the convening of a meeting of scheme members to consider extraordinary resolutions to remove the responsible entity corporations law
consideration of part 5c of the corporations act
consideration of those provisions relating to the methods of removing a responsible entity
consideration of the prohibitions upon an entity being chosen or appointed to act as a responsible entity of a registered managed investment scheme
consideration of the provisions relating to the appointment of a company to act as a responsible entity practice and procedure
consideration of the extent of the prima facie case of a contravention of the act and those factors influencing whether the discretion ought to be exercised in favour of granting an interim order

legistitles.title: CORPORATIONS ACT 2001
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 1 Short title [see Note 1]
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252B Calling of meetings of members by responsible entity when requested by members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252C Failure of responsible entity to call meeting of the scheme's members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252D Calling of meetings of members by members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252E Calling of meetings of members by the Court
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252F Amount of notice of meetings
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252G Notice of meetings of members to members, directors and auditors
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252J Contents of notice of meetings of members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252L Members' resolutions
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252M Responsible entity giving notice of members' resolutions
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252N Members' statements to be distributed
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252P Time and place for meetings of members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252R Quorum
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 252S Chairing meetings of members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 253K Matters on which a poll may be demanded
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 253L When a poll is effectively demanded
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FA Responsible entity to be public company and hold Australian financial services licence
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FC Duties of responsible entity
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FD Duties of officers of responsible entity
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FJ Changes only take effect when ASIC alters record of registration
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FK Requirements of section 601FA must be met
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FM Removal of responsible entity by members
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FN ASIC or scheme member may apply to Court for appointment of temporary responsible entity
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 601FP Appointment of temporary responsible entity by Court
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 1319 Power of Court to give directions with respect to meetings ordered by the Court
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 1322 Irregularities
CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 1332 Standard of proof
